name: Jam3
description:
Jam3 is one of the world’s top digital design and production companies. By merging unique interactivity with detailed design we produce engaging digital stories that often incorporate everything from live action, animation and sound design to coded particle systems and complex 3D engines. All the ingredients one might need to create innovative interactive experiences. Our work has been recognized at Cannes, the One show, the Webby’s and SXSW.
We are among the Top 50 all time FWA winners with over 39 FWA’s, including the most recent Site of the Year. Jam3 is located in Toronto and is a member of the Society of Digital Agencies and the Adobe Agency Partner Program.
